issue.title: [CF 1646] 8.5.7 "script ran too long" error came back
issue.body:
Received after game loaded after few my changes with frames and snippets. After game reload didn't had any more error.

 

First error:

Message: [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: script ran too long
Time: Mon Jan 14 02:49:43 2019

comments.body:
CLEU error as well, don't wish create another thread. Also is CLEU UI message suggester is localized for every one?

Message: TellMeWhen_UIErrorOptionsCLEUDur: Couldn't find relative frame: $parentCLEUEvents
Time: Thu Jan 17 02:25:45 2019
Count: 1


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos

For the script ran too long errors, you're not on the latest alpha. There have been fixes for this since the release of 8.5.7.

 

No idea how that second one could ever happen. Not much I can do there. In the future, please create separate issues for issues that are different.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Its stable 8.5.7, I know it was fixed but its still here


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos
